page.title: 18Crane Moor 5
page.content: Crane Moor school was built in 1873and the school house which is now part of the school in 1877. At first it was an infant school but now it is a Junior and Infant School.It was run by the church but now Barnsley Metropolitan Borough Council run it. Atthe end of August 1985 it will close because we only have 27 children in the village,and only a few babies. Our last day at school will be 16th July then in September we will go by bus to either Wortley or Thurgoland schools. Our school has a headteacher, two teachers,a non-teaching assistant who is also the secretary,a cleaner and two dinner ladies.
